name: Space Sheep VS The Biggest Boopy
name_original: Space Sheep VS The Biggest Boopy
description:
The Intergalactic Trade Federation of Space Sheep (ITFSS) is under attack by the Big Boopy! Can you defeat all the Big Boopy? What secrets are held by the Divine Oranges? Is the Biggest Boopy really so Big? What will become of the ITFSS? Play this terrible game I made in four days, and you too will be able to advance the Space Sheep corporate chain! Or perhaps you fancy yourself a Sheep Magician? Step into the Boopiness, and find out...

Credits:

Eran Eisenber - Everything except music

Letter Box - Music
